item.title: Kim add a quote by Richard Wright
item.description: "They hate because they fear, and they fear because they feel that the deepest feelings of their lives are being assaulted and outraged. And they do not know why; they are powerless pawns in a blind play of social forces." -- Richard Wright

item.title: Kim add a quote by Richard Wright
item.description: "He had lived and acted on the assumption that he was alone, and now he saw that he had not been. What he had done made others suffer. No matter how much he would long for them to forget him, they would not be able to. His family was a part of him, not only in blood, but in spirit." -- Richard Wright

item.title: Kim add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "...there would be punishment and pain, and there would be happiness, too. That was writing." -- Markus Zusak

item.title: Kim add a quote by Kate Chopin
item.description: "Perhaps it is better to wake up after all, even to suffer, rather than to remain a dupe to illusions all one's life." -- Kate Chopin

item.title: Kim add a quote by Jane Goodall
item.description: "What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make." -- Jane Goodall

item.title: Kim add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I never travel without my diary. One should always have something sensational to read in the train." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kim add a quote by May Sarton
item.description: "We have to dare to be ourselves, however frightening or strange that self may prove to be." -- May Sarton

item.title: Kim add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "Three things in human life are important: the first is to be kind; the second is to be kind; and the third is to be kind." -- Henry James

item.title: Kim add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Kim add a quote by Ralph Ellison
item.description: "I'd been so fascinated by the notion, that I'd forgotten to measure what it was bringing forth. I'd been asleep, dreaming." -- Ralph Ellison

item.title: Kim add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "Meanings is not important, said the BFG. I cannot be right all the time. Quite often I is left instead of right." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Kim add a quote by Marcel Proust
item.description: "Let us be grateful to the people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom." -- Marcel Proust

item.title: Kim add a quote by L.M. Montgomery
item.description: "Isn't it nice to think that tomorrow is a new day with no mistakes in it yet?" -- L.M. Montgomery

item.title: Kim add a quote by William Dietrich
item.description: "What sets our species apart is not just what men will do to other men, but how tirelessly they justify it." -- William Dietrich

item.title: Kim add a quote by Charles Lamb
item.description: "Tis the privilege of friendship to talk nonsense, and to have her nonsense respected." -- Charles Lamb

item.title: Kim add a quote by Jane Yolen
item.description: "Literature is a textually transmitted disease, normally contracted in childhood." -- Jane Yolen

item.title: Kim add a quote by Ralph Ellison
item.description: "Life is to be lived, not controlled; and humanity is won by continuing to play in face of certain defeat." -- Ralph Ellison

item.title: Kim add a quote by Yogi Berra
item.description: "Always go to other people's funerals, otherwise they won't come to yours." -- Yogi Berra

item.title: Kim add a quote by Lalita Tademy
item.description: "You can't tell how heavy somebody else's load is just from looking. The Lord doesn't give us more than we can carry" -- Lalita Tademy

item.title: Kim add a quote by Lalita Tademy
item.description: "Reaching too deep into something not meant for you is full of pain. Figure out what you can have and work on that" -- Lalita Tademy

item.title: Kim add a quote by Lalita Tademy
item.description: "Sometimes while you wait for what you think is better," Philomene said, "what is good enough slips away." -- Lalita Tademy

item.title: Kim add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Kim add a quote by William Wordsworth
item.description: "Wisdom is oft-times nearer when we stoop Than when we soar." -- William Wordsworth

item.title: Kim add a quote by Robert J. Sawyer
item.description: "Learning to ignore things is one of the great paths to inner peace." -- Robert J. Sawyer

item.title: Kim add a quote by Alan Bennett
item.description: "What she was finding also was how one book led to another, doors kept opening wherever she turned and the days weren't long enough for the reading she wanted to do." -- Alan Bennett

item.title: Kim add a quote by Gregory Maguire
item.description: "People who claim that they're evil are usually no worse than the rest of us... It's people who claim that they're good, or any way better than the rest of us, that you have to be wary of." -- Gregory Maguire

item.title: Kim add a quote by E.L. Doctorow
item.description: "Writing is a socially acceptable form of schizophrenia." -- E.L. Doctorow

item.title: Kim add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description:
"Ain't you thinkin' what's it gonna be like when we get there? Ain't you scared it won't be nice like we thought?
No, she said quickly. No, I ain't. You can't do that. I can't do that. It's too much - livin' too many lives. Up ahead they's a thousan' lives we might live, but when it comes, it'll on'y be one." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Kim add a quote by Jon Krakauer
item.description: "You are wrong if you think Joy emanates only or principally from human relationships. God has placed it all around us. It is in everything and anything we might experience. We just have to have the courage to turn against our habitual lifestyle and engage in unconventional living." -- Jon Krakauer

item.title: Kim add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "I solemnly swear that I am up to no good." -- J.K. Rowling
